category.name: Product Structure.Product Structure Synchronization
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PS_replace_with_substructure
preference.preference_description: Determines whether substructures below the selected node can be replaced, along with the selected node.Users can replace an item representing a node in the structure with another item. All data associated with the original node is preserved. This preference determines whether substructures can also be replaced. Valid Values: true - The selected node and its entire substructure (if any) are replaced without prompting. false - If the selected node contains a substructure, the system displays an error message and does not complete the replacement action.
